title: ImageWriteBase64
name: ImageWriteBase64
description: Writes Base64 images to the specified filename and destination.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: destination
arguments.description: The path for the destination file.

arguments.name: inHTMLFormat
arguments.description:
Specify whether Base64 output includes the headers used by the Base64 images in the HTML "img" tag ("data:image/{format};base64,...") :
- true
- false (default)
